name: Bithumb Holdings, Inc.
description: Bithumb Holdings, Inc. is a leading cryptocurrency exchange and blockchain technology company based in South Korea. Founded in 2014, Bithumb has established itself as one of the largest and most popular platforms for trading digital assets, including Bitcoin, Ethereum, and various altcoins. The company emphasizes security, user experience, and innovation, offering advanced trading features such as spot trading, futures, and margin trading. Bithumb is committed to promoting the global adoption of blockchain technology and digital currencies, providing educational resources, and collaborating with regulatory bodies to ensure a compliant and sustainable ecosystem. As a pioneer in the cryptocurrency space, Bithumb also invests in blockchain startups and develops proprietary technology to enhance its platform's functionality and security. The company plays a crucial role in shaping the future of finance by facilitating easy access to cryptocurrency markets for millions of users worldwide.

faq.answer: Bithumb's main products include spot trading, futures trading, and wallet services.
